properties.name: camel.component.aws2-translate.access-key
properties.description: Amazon AWS Access Key

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-translate.autodetect-source-language
properties.description: Being able to autodetect the source language

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-translate.autowired-enabled
properties.description: Whether autowiring is enabled. This is used for automatic autowiring options (the option must be marked as autowired) by looking up in the registry to find if there is a single instance of matching type, which then gets configured on the component. This can be used for automatic configuring JDBC data sources, JMS connection factories, AWS Clients, etc.

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-translate.configuration
properties.description: Component configuration. The option is a org.apache.camel.component.aws2.translate.Translate2Configuration type.

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-translate.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable auto configuration of the aws2-translate component. This is enabled by default.

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-translate.lazy-start-producer
properties.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-translate.operation
properties.description: The operation to perform

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-translate.override-endpoint
properties.description: Set the need for overidding the endpoint. This option needs to be used in combination with uriEndpointOverride option

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-translate.pojo-request
properties.description: If we want to use a POJO request as body or not

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-translate.proxy-host
properties.description: To define a proxy host when instantiating the Translate client

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-translate.proxy-port
properties.description: To define a proxy port when instantiating the Translate client

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-translate.proxy-protocol
properties.description: To define a proxy protocol when instantiating the Translate client

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-translate.region
properties.description: The region in which Translate client needs to work. When using this parameter, the configuration will expect the lowercase name of the region (for example ap-east-1) You'll need to use the name Region.EU_WEST_1.id()

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-translate.secret-key
properties.description: Amazon AWS Secret Key

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-translate.source-language
properties.description: Source language to use

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-translate.target-language
properties.description: Target language to use

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-translate.translate-client
properties.description: To use a existing configured AWS Translate as client. The option is a software.amazon.awssdk.services.translate.TranslateClient type.

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-translate.trust-all-certificates
properties.description: If we want to trust all certificates in case of overriding the endpoint

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-translate.uri-endpoint-override
properties.description: Set the overriding uri endpoint. This option needs to be used in combination with overrideEndpoint option

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-translate.use-default-credentials-provider
properties.description: Set whether the Translate client should expect to load credentials through a default credentials provider or to expect static credentials to be passed in.
